title: Crypto Zone
author: Crypto Zone
content: Hello. comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Since you are already aware of the bounty section, your friend will probably be a bounty hunter. I will have to ask you a simple question, which is: what do you mean by how do you start? Do you mean how do you start earning? Or how do you start learning about the forum? For surviving the forum, The forum is a social place where you can be free and be yourself just as in the real world. The rules are not hard, and you will enjoy your journey here very well if you can be able to follow a few simple rules, which are "Don't Plagiarize". Don't get yourself involved in creating a lot of low-quality threads with a bunch of copy-and-paste content from online. For now, focus on reading through others threads and opinions and asking questions where necessary. And follow the guidelines of the link provided above and the ones that will come after. For earning, you will first have to know how the forum works before you can start earning from it. Your contribution is what's going to earn you a couple of merits, which will possibly rank you up if your activity is up to a rank, and the more you continue being active, your consistency is surely going to pay off. Then, if you have other skills like programming, graphics, or any other service that you think you can offer, you can also make some little earnings from them by just advertising yourself, and those who will be in need of your service will contact you. You just have to keep a clean profile.
